[Vial of Fampyr Blood](/vialOfFampyrBlood/) |head = Blackened Plate Helm |neck = Red Cape |body = Blackened Plate Armor |weapon1 = Superb Sabre (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Sabre |weapon1_offhand = Superb Mace (Deadfire){{!}}Superb Mace |internalname = CHA_CRE_20_SG_Fampyr_Crypt_Quartermaster |guid = a9f62bdc-8a02-47f1-ad98-c7e6aa371075 }} '''Quartermaster Harka''' is a character in {{poe2}}. ## Background The quartermaster of the undead nation at the [Splintered Reef](/splinteredReef/). ## Loot * [Blackened Plate Armor](/blackenedPlateArmor/) * [Blackened Plate Helm](/blackenedPlateHelm/) ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = [A Paradise of the Mind](/aParadiseOfTheMind/) |none = |other = }} ## =Quests = * [A Paradise of the Mind](/aParadiseOfTheMind/): He drops a [Vial of Fampyr Blood](/vialOfFampyrBlood/), which is needed to open the door to the [Glowing Outcrop](/glowingOutcrop/). ## Gallery PE2_Quartermaster_Harka_Group.png | Harka and his guards [Category:Splintered Reef characters](/categorySplinteredReefCharacters/)
